price: ߢߊ߬ߒߡߊ߭ ߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߝߘߴߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߣߍߡߊ ߸ ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲ߠߊ߫ ߥߘߋ߬ߥߘߋ߬ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan mina al-lahi waniʿ'matan wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
